title: Add Gallery section with static images and lightbox preview

requirements.summary: Add a new Gallery section to the single-page site with an English heading/description and a responsive image grid.
acceptanceCriteria: A new section exists with id="gallery" and is rendered in the main page flow.
The section displays the available gallery images in a responsive grid (e.g., 1 column on mobile, 2+ columns on larger screens).
All user-facing text in the section is in English.

file_operations.description: Create the Gallery section component with id="gallery", an English heading + short descriptive text, and a responsive Tailwind grid layout for thumbnails.
Render the new GallerySection in the existing single-page main flow (ensure it is not orphaned and appears among the other sections).

requirements.summary: Add image-1.jpg as a static asset and render it in the Gallery with an English alt attribute.
acceptanceCriteria: The file image-1.jpg is included as a static asset under frontend/public/assets (or a subfolder) and loads successfully in production.
The Gallery section renders image-1.jpg and the has a descriptive English alt attribute.

file_operations.description: Add the static image asset at frontend/public/assets/gallery/image-1.jpg so it is served in production builds.
Render the thumbnail using the static asset /assets/gallery/image-1.jpg and provide a descriptive English alt attribute.

requirements.summary: Implement a lightbox/modal preview so clicking a gallery thumbnail opens a larger preview with accessible close controls.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a gallery thumbnail opens a modal/lightbox with a larger version of the same image.
The modal can be closed via an explicit close control and via Escape key.
Focus management and aria attributes are present/appropriate per the UI component used (e.g., shadcn Dialog).

file_operations.description: Create a lightweight, accessible modal/lightbox component (e.g., using the native HTML <dialog> element or an existing project modal component) that supports Escape-to-close, a visible close button, and appropriate aria labeling.
Wire thumbnail click handling to open GalleryLightbox with the selected image, ensuring focus behavior is reasonable and close actions (button + Escape) work.

requirements.summary: Add Gallery to the site navigation so users can smoothly scroll to the Gallery section from desktop and mobile menus.
acceptanceCriteria: The header navigation includes a “Gallery” link pointing to #gallery.
Clicking “Gallery” smoothly scrolls to the Gallery section on both desktop and mobile navigation.

file_operations.description: Add a “Gallery” item to navLinks with href "#gallery" so both desktop and mobile menus can smooth-scroll to the new Gallery section.
